[![Current
Version](https://img.shields.io/github/r-package/v/insightsengineering/teal.widgets/main?color=purple&label=package%20version)](https://github.com/insightsengineering/teal.widgets/tree/main)
[![Open
Issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-raw/insightsengineering/teal.widgets?color=red&label=open%20issues)](https://github.com/insightsengineering/teal.widgets/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc)

This package provides various widgets for `teal` applications. Examples
include:

- `standard_layout` for a standard UI layout with output on the right
  and an encoding panel on the left
- `plot_with_settings` for a standard plot output UI with resizing and
  downloading options
- `table_with_setting` for a standard `rtables` output UI with download
  and pagination options
- `ggplot2_args` for a standard `ggplot2` output plot with graphic
  options
- `basic_table_args` for a standard `rtables` output table with graphic
  options

## Installation

``` r
install.packages('teal.widgets')
```

Alternatively, you might want to use the development version.

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("insightsengineering/teal.widgets")
```

## Usage

To understand how to use this package, please refer to the [package
website](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/), which
provides multiple examples of code usage.

## Getting help

If you encounter a bug or you have a feature request - please file an
issue. For questions, discussions and staying up to date, please use the
‚Äúteal‚Äù channel in the [`pharmaverse` slack
workspace](https://pharmaverse.slack.com).

# Package index

## User interface functions

Functions providing special user-interface elements

- [`clean_brushedPoints()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/clean_brushedPoints.md)
  : Clean brushed points

- [`draggable_buckets()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/draggable_buckets.md)
  : Draggable Buckets

- [`get_dt_rows()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/get_dt_rows.md)
  :

  Map `lenghtMenu` property

- [`optionalSelectInput()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/optionalSelectInput.md)
  [`updateOptionalSelectInput()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/optionalSelectInput.md)
  :

  Wrapper for `pickerInput`

- [`optionalSliderInput()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/optionalSliderInput.md)
  : Optional Slider Input Widget

- [`optionalSliderInputValMinMax()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/optionalSliderInputValMinMax.md)
  : Optional Slider Input with minimal and maximal values

- [`panel_group()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/panel_group.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Panel group widget

- [`panel_item()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/panel_item.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Panel item widget

- [`plot_with_settings_ui()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/plot_with_settings.md)
  [`plot_with_settings_srv()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/plot_with_settings.md)
  : Plot-with-settings module

- [`standard_layout()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/standard_layout.md)
  : Standard UI layout

- [`table_with_settings_ui()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/table_with_settings.md)
  [`table_with_settings_srv()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/table_with_settings.md)
  :

  `table_with_settings` module

- [`white_small_well()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/white_small_well.md)
  : Small well class for HTML

- [`verbatim_popup_ui()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/verbatim_popup.md)
  [`verbatim_popup_srv()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/verbatim_popup.md)
  :

  A `shiny` module that pops up verbatim text.

- [`nested_closeable_modal()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/nested_closeable_modal.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Nested Closeable Modal Popup

## ggplot2 and basic_table arguments

Aggregation and validation of arguments

- [`basic_table_args()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/basic_table_args.md)
  :

  Builds a `basic_table_args` object

- [`ggplot2_args()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/ggplot2_args.md)
  :

  Creates `ggplot2_args` object

- [`parse_ggplot2_args()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/parse_ggplot2_args.md)
  :

  Parse `ggplot2_args` object into the `ggplot2` expression

- [`parse_basic_table_args()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/parse_basic_table_args.md)
  :

  Parses `basic_table_args` object into the `basic_table` expression

- [`resolve_basic_table_args()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/resolve_basic_table_args.md)
  :

  Resolves and reduces multiple `basic_table_args` objects

- [`resolve_ggplot2_args()`](https://insightsengineering.github.io/teal.widgets/reference/resolve_ggplot2_args.md)
  :

  Resolving and reducing multiple `ggplot2_args` objects
